title: Help with champion icons in forums
body:
So to do it its "{champion:number}"
But what im wondering is what number corresponds to what champ, a list or help would be awesome guys.

replies.body:
You can also simply click on the champion icon under the text field. Otherwise you'll just need to memorize the champion numbers you like to link. 

https://i.gyazo.com/a77baaf4b0eb41c002bde7dfed549e01.png
Thanks for the help, is there a text field on mobile?
Eeeeeeehhhhh not 100% sure how those buttons work on mobile tbh =\ . I don't believe they were designed with mobile devices at all in mind.
Oh ok thanks for the help anyways
